title: social media
extract: Social media are interactive computer-mediated technologies that facilitate the creation and sharing of information, ideas, nudes, Memes, career interests and other forms of expression via virtual communities and networks. The variety of stand-alone and built-in social media services currently available introduces challenges of definition; however, there are some common features
extract_html: Social media are interactive computer-mediated technologies that facilitate the creation and sharing of information, ideas, nudes, Memes, career interests and other forms of expression via virtual communities and networks. The variety of stand-alone and built-in social media services currently available introduces challenges of definition; however, there are some common features
